title: OLBH hosts annual fundraiser March 2
maintext:
ASHLAND — The Our Lady of Bellefonte Hospital (OLBH) Foundation will host its seventh annual Bourbon, Barbecue & Basketball event Saturday, March 2, at 1 p.m. at Bellefonte Pavilion (2000 Ashland Drive) on the hospital campus.
Attendees of the event will enjoy a live airing of that day’s University of Kentucky basketball game verses Tennessee as well as receiving a special collector’s bottle of Maker’s Mark Private Select bourbon which was bottled especially for the event. The fundraiser will include Kentucky-themed food, Kentucky craft beers on tap, bluegrass music by Ned Crisp and Bottomline, and a silent auction. Attendees are encouraged to dress casually in the attire of their favorite sports team. A basketball toss competition will allow participants to test their hoop skills.
Tickets for Bourbon, Barbecue & Basketball are $125. All proceeds from the event will support the efforts of the OLBH Foundation, the philanthropic arm of OLBH. Reservations can be made online at olbhfoundation.org/bourbon or by calling the foundation office at 606-833-3653.
